pages.text: The Listener is a block which, when a Switchboard is inserted, listens for any notes played by instruments within its range (48 blocks) and outputs a redstone signal if the note matches the configured filter criteria.

pages.title: Listener GUI
pages.text: Right clicking on a placed Listener allows you to open the Listener GUI and insert a Switchboard into the Switchboard slot. When a Switchboard is inserted you can configure the Switchboard properties using the GUI.

pages.title: Switchboard Properties
pages.text: Listeners use the following $(l:switchboard_properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Filter Note$(br)- Filter Instrument
